function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Residents of Krakow may have been exposed to a higher risk of contagious diseases due to increased visitation to urban green spaces during the pandemic.","Impact":"Potential increase in the spread of contagious diseases within the urban population, leading to a higher likelihood of infection and transmission.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict social distancing measures, limit the capacity of urban green spaces, and promote the use of face masks and hand hygiene.","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring and management systems, contactless entry systems, and mobile applications for capacity control.","People":"Residents and visitors of urban green spaces in Krakow","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, and green space management organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness or education about safe practices in urban green spaces during the pandemic could lead to higher exposure to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission due to lack of adherence to safety guidelines and protocols in green spaces.","Mitigation":"Education campaigns on safe usage of urban green spaces, distribution of informational materials, and community engagement on best practices.","Technologies":"Digital signage for guidelines, mobile applications for communication and education, and virtual training programs for green space staff.","People":"Residents, visitors, and staff of urban green spaces in Krakow","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government, and green space management organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate infrastructure and maintenance of urban green spaces may contribute to unsanitary conditions, increasing the risk of contagious diseases transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission due to lack of cleanliness and hygiene in urban green spaces.","Mitigation":"Investment in infrastructure improvement, regular sanitation and cleaning schedules, and implementation of waste management systems.","Technologies":"Smart waste management systems, IoT sensors for sanitation monitoring, and automated cleaning equipment.","People":"Residents, visitors, and maintenance staff of urban green spaces in Krakow","Owner":"Green space management organizations, local government, and sanitation authorities"}]}
